channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13390] HiveServer2: Add more test to ZK service discovery using MiniHS2
item.summary: HiveServer2: Add more test to ZK service discovery using MiniHS2

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12801148 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build
Validating test failures. Most seem unrelated, running some locally. If they look unrelated, will commit this.
Committed to master. Thanks sushanth for the review.
vgumashta, please update Fix Version/s for this issue. Besides 2.0.1 (branch-2.0), there are commits for 2.1.0 (master), 1.3.0 (branch-1), and 1.2.2 (branch-1.2).
Thanks for the spot, leftylev, I've added them.
vgumashta, is this the jira which solved the problem CVE-2016-3083 ?

call-fold
Yes, this addresses CVE-2016-3083 .
Useful reference to keytool for testing purpose: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/technotes/tools/windows/keytool.html
